New Records: Coby White recorded a career-high nine three-pointers
Key Match Events: Chicago Bulls defeated New York Knicks 139-126
Zach LaVine and Coby White each scored 33 points
Derrick Rose was honored at halftime
Pre-Game Insights: The Bulls announced plans to retire Derrick Rose's jersey next season
The team was motivated to perform well in Rose's honor
Post-Match Reflections: Coby White emphasized the importance of the win to honor Derrick Rose
The Bulls continued to show competitive prowess
Miscellaneous Highlights: Karl-Anthony Towns scored 44 points for the Knicks
The game was significant for the Bulls' season progress
